subject: Re: Website Footer Update
preview: @manuel great! Ok to do on live also!

full_threads.body: @manuel great! Ok to do on live also!
@manuel ok to live also - cheers !
@heath @joel  please check this one https://staging-debtmediators.kinsta.com/
@manuel great, happy for you to live them too.
@heath @joel  its ready for you to review https://staging-newleaf.kinsta.com/
@heath @joel its ready for you to check this https://staging-debthelpline.kinsta.com/
@manuel great! Please add it to the live site and then you can start on the other 4 sites. Cheers
@heath @joel  its ready for you to check https://staging-dcs.kinsta.com/
@joel Manuel is going to start on these and see how he goes. FYI.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig
Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi James, 

Ok cool. We will roll them out by the end of the week and the absolute latest and send you a message when they are ready to check.

Hi Heath,



Let's roll these out. Thanks very much.



When could I expect this completed? No significant rush.



Thanks,



James








Regards,












James Ososki | Digital Marketing ManagerP: 1300 725 052 | F: 1300 329 327
PO Box 3074, Newstead QLD 4006






Trust, Freedom,
Understanding.

Let me get back to you on these. Thanks








Regards,

Hi James, 

Hope you are well. Did you get a chance to review the footer designs as yet? I have reattached them for your convenience.
Mock ups attached, pending client approval before we code.

Hi James, sure we will work on a mock up of these for you, no problems. 

We will get these to you tomorrow.

Hi Heath,

We need to update the footer on all our sites to include our new national offices. I have an example below:



We need to roll this out across all the websites we have with you.

Please note the following:
· New Sydney address: Levels 5 & 6, 616 Harris St Ultimo Sydney NSW 2007 Australia
· Would be good to get more aesthetically pleasing map images

Can you please provide some mockups?

Will this be covered under our current arrangement?

Many Thanks,

James Ososki





Regards,

<https://www.dcsgroup.com.au/>
